mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into seller_info (username, `password`, create_time, update_time, address, descript, `state`, user_count) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update seller_info set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descript = #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_count = #{userCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sell_id = #{sellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sell_id, username, `password`, create_time, update_time, address, descript, `state`, user_count from seller_info where sell_id = #{sellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select sell_id, username, `password`, create_time, update_time, address, descript, `state`, user_count from seller_info
